imgAlt: Vietnamese beef noodle soup with fresh herbs
instructions: Char onion and ginger over flame or in broiler.
Simmer broth with charred onion, ginger, star anise, and cinnamon for 30 minutes.
Strain broth and season with fish sauce.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Place noodles in bowl, arrange raw beef slices on top.
Ladle hot broth over beef to cook it.
Serve with bean sprouts, herbs, lime, and condiments on the side.
